faq_items.question: What is the procedure for subscribing to ISA?
faq_items.answer: To subscribe to ISA, simply visit our website, choose your preferred plan (LITE, SMART, ABOVE LITE, or INFINITY), fill out the registration form with your business details, and complete the payment process. Our team will then contact you within 24 hours to set up your account and provide training.

faq_items.question: Is ISA free?
faq_items.answer: ISA offers a 14-day free trial for all new users. After the trial period, you'll need to choose from our subscription plans starting at $99/month for the LITE plan. We believe in providing value, so you can test all features before committing.

faq_items.question: Android / iOS - feature?
faq_items.answer: Yes! ISA is fully compatible with both Android and iOS devices. Our mobile app provides all the essential features including POS functionality, inventory management, sales tracking, and real-time reporting. Download from Google Play Store or Apple App Store.

faq_items.question: Is ISA usable on Laptop/PC?
faq_items.answer: Absolutely! ISA works seamlessly on laptops and desktop computers through any modern web browser. The web version includes all features and provides a comprehensive dashboard for managing your business operations with larger screen real estate.

faq_items.question: Optional Equipment
faq_items.answer: While ISA works with standard devices, we recommend optional equipment for enhanced functionality: receipt printers, barcode scanners, cash drawers, card readers, and tablet stands. Our team can help you choose the right equipment for your business type.

faq_items.question: How to download & test ISA?
faq_items.answer: Visit our website and click 'Get Started Now' to begin your free 14-day trial. You can download the mobile app from your device's app store or access the web version directly through your browser. No credit card required for the trial period.

faq_items.question: How to subscribe to ISA?
faq_items.answer: After your trial period, log into your ISA account, go to 'Billing & Subscription', select your preferred plan, enter your payment information, and confirm your subscription. You'll receive immediate access to all premium features based on your chosen plan.

faq_items.question: How to connect to ISA?
faq_items.answer: Connection to ISA is simple: ensure you have a stable internet connection, open the ISA app or web portal, enter your login credentials, and you're connected! The system works both online and offline, syncing data when connection is restored.

faq_items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faq_items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, bank transfers, and mobile money payments. For enterprise clients, we also offer invoice-based billing with NET 30 terms.

faq_items.question: ISA overview?
faq_items.answer: ISA is a comprehensive business management solution designed for restaurants, beauty salons, retail stores, bars, and service businesses. It includes POS systems, inventory management, customer relationship tools, analytics, and multi-location support - all in one integrated platform.

faq_items.question: How to train for ISA?
faq_items.answer: We provide comprehensive training including: live onboarding sessions, video tutorials, detailed documentation, practice environments, and ongoing support. Our training team ensures you and your staff are fully comfortable with all ISA features before going live.
